column10: permanent FAA administrator Michael Huerta finished his five year term

Mark Esper, who had served as Secretary of the Army since Nov. 2017. Secretary of Defense James Mattis resigned in Dec. 2018 and his deputy Patrick Shanahan took over as acting secretary. Shanahan resigned after allegations came out about domestic violence, his wife punching him in 2010 and his son hitting his mom in 2011.

Jonathan Cohen. Nicki Haley resigned in Dec. 2018, and Trump named Heather Nauert, the former State Department spokeswoman and Fox News “Fox & Friends” anchor, to take the role. She withdrew in February 2019. Trump has nominated Kelly Craft, the current ambassador to canada.
White House Chief of Staff: Mick Mulvaney since Jan 2, 2019.
took over for Mick mulvaney when he became acting chief of staff
Took over for Pam Patenaude, who resigned suddenly.
after Ronald Vitiello (June 30, 2018 – April 12, 2019), under Vitiello’s leadership, ICE started implementing a policy of "zero tolerance".
Acting DHS secretary: Kevin McAleenan following the resignation of Kirstjen Nielsen on April 7, 2019
